aircraft.value: Cerberus Defense - AC-2554-415 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Servo valve spool sticking. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 22/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 23/02/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/02/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 25/02/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 01/03/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
